comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: It's great to see such a ground-breaking legal document here on Flickr! I don't understand why it is captioned in presentation out of order ... perhaps it has to do with an "archival protocol" or something, however it might be advantageous for folks to be able to read the document in "consecutive order". Said differently, "(page 1 of 5)" [above] is actually "page 4" of the five-page document...  "(page 5 of 5)" is actually "page 1" of the document... etc. I did note that the digital copies stored at ARC Identifier 597554 are captioned and displayed in the correct order.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: Hi Pixel Wrangler, Thanks for pointing out this mix-up! We just fixed it. We love this document, too. One of our archivists, Cynthia Fox, shared it with us on our blog, NARAtions: blogs.archives.gov/online-public-access/?p=305. - Jill (U.S. National Archives)
